title: Seeds of a new life
creator_credit: Nigel Evans, Richard Mordaunt, John Bloomfield and Randel Evans Productions
brief_description: Shows the work of Dorothy Heathcote, lecturer in drama, and a group of her students with the mentally handicapped children and adults at Earls House Hospital. Dorothy Heathcote discusses and demonstrates her methods and the patients participate in a variety of developmental acting and thinking activities.
